TopicTitle: 1.1 - 8K Textures quality drops immensly when zoomed in even a little bit

Articles.Content:
As you can see this is not some quality getting bad gradually as zooming in kind of quality drop. This happens while looking at the planet from a certain distance and even if i zoom in with just 1 small turn of the wheel texture quality goes bad immensely as if it is no longer using the 8K textures. I don't remember it being like this in 1.0 version. Is this normal or a bug caused by Unity 5? Zoom in on the pictures and compare them and you can clearly see the difference between two. How to solve this?
